sentences.en: Hypothalamus - A region of the brain that collects and funnels information into the pituitary gland.
sentences.cn: 下丘脑 - 一种地区的大脑和渠道的信息收集到脑下垂体.

sentences.cn: 目的探讨飞行训练对飞行学员下丘脑 - 垂体 - 性腺轴功能的影响.

sentences.en: The anterior hypothalamus provides thermoregulation when the body is too hot.
sentences.cn: 当人体过热时,下丘脑前部可提供温度调节作用.

sentences.en: The change of hypothalamus - pituitary - gonad ( HPG ) axis is very predominant in this process.

sentences.en: The hypothalamus controls hormone secretions from the nearby pituitary gland.
sentences.cn: 下丘脑控制附近脑下垂体分泌激素.

sentences.en: The hypothalamus is primary brain region that responds to leptin, sending a signal that curbs appetite.
sentences.cn: 下丘脑是对瘦素起反应的最主要的大脑区域, 通过传递信号来抑制食欲.

sentences.en: The hypothalamus produces hormones that regulate sleep, sex drive, body temperature, and more.
sentences.cn: 下视丘分泌荷尔蒙用作控制睡眠 、 性冲动 、 体温以及其他人类生理现象.

sentences.en: The posterior hypothalamus performs the function of defence against cold.
sentences.cn: 下丘脑后部执行着抵御寒冷的功能.

sentences.en: The scientists then traced the leptin decline to a pathway that originates in the brain's hypothalamus.
sentences.cn: 随后,科学家跟踪瘦素下降原因,找到通路的源头——大脑下丘脑部.

sentences.en: The stress response is controlled by the hypothalamus.
sentences.cn: 反应激烈是由丘脑下部控制的。

sentences.en: The temperature control centre is located in the hypothalamus.
sentences.cn: 温度控制中心位于下丘脑.

sentences.en: They demonstrated the transmission of impulses from the cortex to the hypothalamus.
